issue.title: [CF 156] Error when using Mirror Image in combat.
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Define an icon for Mirror Image as in attached config.
2. Enter combat.
3. Cast Mirror Image.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
An icon should appear (as defined) and disappear after 30 secs. Instead I have MI icon not showing up with some sideffects like i.e. Living Bomb icon not disappearing after my target has died.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
4.0.1.3

Do you have an error log of what happened?
383x TellMeWhen-4.0.1.3\Types\icd.lua:108: attempt to perform arithmetic on field 'StartTime' (a nil value)
TellMeWhen-4.0.1.3\TellMeWhen.lua:714: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:705>

Please provide any additional information below.
The icon for mirror image has been working in previous (release) version. Haven't changed anything with its definition, just installed new (4.0.1.3) version of TMW.


> Posted by CurseForge user danbar74 | Imported from CurseForge issue #156 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: config-and-screenshot.zip

config-and-screenshot.zip

<p>ZIP contains TMW config and screenshot with the error.</p>


> Posted by CurseForge user danbar74

Yikes! Sorry! Fix is up.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
